entry.title: EuroPython2012
entry.summary:
Europython 2012..

I am seriously looking forward to EuroPython2012.

The conference takes place in Florence, Italy. A city that has been on my visit-list for a very long time.

My collegue "MartinO" and I, depart Dusseldorf on Sunday 1.7.2012 and will be attending for the entire week.

This blog is where, I will try to give a running list of the information that is absorbed! Both for my collegues at Adcloud and for whoever stumbles across it in the future.

Ill try to execute the coverage in the same manner that Reinout van Rees has done previously for djangocon.. which I have found to be incredibly informative.

The conference is unfortunately not single-track and Martin and I will try to attend teh most interesting/useful talks of the day. Failing that, then will be outside in the sun eating gelato!
